title: Alesha Dixon displays her post-baby body in a form-fitting white vest top and khaki trousers
text:
She recently welcomed her second child with husband, Azuka Onenye.

And following the birth of their daughter Anaya, Alesha Dixon looked incredible as she headed back to work on America's Got Talent in California on Tuesday afternoon.

The British star, 40, worked a casual stylish look as she donned a white vest top teamed with a pair of paper bag-style high waisted trousers.

Wow! Following the birth of their daughter Anaya, Alesha Dixon looked incredible as she headed back to work on America's Got Talent in California on Tuesday afternoon

She teamed her work attire with a pair of perspex heels, while forgoing any accessories aside from a pair of large, square sunglasses.

Alesha appeared to opt for minimal touches of make-up and kept her look natural, styling her sleek brunette tresses back into a low ponytail.

The Britain's Got Talent judge arrived at filming alongside former supermodel Heidi Klum, 46, and their fellow judge Howie Mandel, 63.

Details: She teamed her work attire with a pair of perspex heels, while forgoing any accessories aside from a pair of large, square sunglasses

Earlier in the week, Alesha said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya.

In her confirmation message shared with her Instagram followers, she wrote: 'Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.'

The Hertfordshire native confirmed she was expecting her second child with Azuka in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Glam: Alesha appeared to opt for minimal touches of make-up and kept her look natural, styling her sleek brunette tresses back into a low ponytail

Cool: Alesha appeared relaxed as she strolled towards the studios with her hands in her pockets

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series, the media personality revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting dress.

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Alesha later enthused she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband. 'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

Beaming! The talent judge smiled from ear to ear during her appearance

She's here! The Britain's Got Talent judge arrived at filming alongside former supermodel Heidi Klum, 46, and their fellow judge Howie Mandel, 63

Camo king: Howie cut a casual look in plain white t-shirt, and green camouflage cargo pants

The TV star had previously confessed she felt 'so much more relaxed' in her second pregnancy.

She gushed during an appearance on Loose Women: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around. It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
